entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
